text:
Created attachment 32207
Shows bug

Hello,
We noticed a really annoying bug under Java 8 only with Aggregate Graph.
As you can see on screenshot:
- There is a kind of mirror effect on values
- Position of legends is wrong as long as values

Regards
@ubikloadpack

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
See:
https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8065373

Workaround is to downgrade to JDK7u40.
